page.title: 14A Visitor's view,Bridlington
page.content: My name is Alexander Prosser. My father works in Bridlington School as a computer studies teacher. I don't know all of Bridlington, as we live in Warter, but I know the sea front area a bit. The{beach}is wide and curved into a semi-circle; thousands of tourists visit it each year. {Prince Street}has medium sized illuminations and opens onto the beach and harbour. The{harbour}houses Bridlington's fishing fleet and several private boats. Near the Spa theatre is the{lifeboat {station,}it is away from the beach and the lifeboat is launched from a trolley. The trolley is towed to the beach by a special tractor which can go right into the water.
